entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
